'''Zichang''' was a historian from [[Liyue]] and the author of the multi-volume Stone Tablet Compilations, a history book that compiles and translates the ancient stone tablets of Liyue which recount a variety of fragmentary historical events. The [[Stone Tablet Compilations: Vol. I|first volume]] of Zichang's publication recounts the history of how [[Rex Lapis]] descended, [[Guizhong]] built the [[Guizhong Ballista]], the pair ruled over [[Guili Plains]] together, and the formation of [[Liyue Harbor]] under Rex Lapis in an era of peace.<ref name="ST1C">{{Ref/Book|Stone Tablet Compilations: Vol. I}}</ref> Elsewhere in Stone Tablet Compilations, Zichang's writings include a number of allusions to the oft-changing physical appearance of the [[Adeptus]] [[Xianyun|Cloud Retainer]]<ref name="XYCD">{{Ref/CS|Xianyun|Character Details}}</ref> and the tale of the legendary founder of the [[Yun Family|Yun family]].<ref name="CF">{{Ref/Weapon|Cloudforged}}</ref>
